contents.title: Giffyglyph's Pious Paladin
contents.blurb:
You are a paladin, a master of weaponry and warfare. You thrive in battle where your indomitable resolve can turn defeat into victory. But as you strike out into the world, what kind of paladin will you choose to be?

Are you a warrior, unleashing powerful smites against your enemies? Are you a defender, protecting your allies with sacred auras and potent magic? Or are you a crusader, converting people to your cause with powerful words and vows?

Whatever your focus, Giffyglyph's Pious Paladin introduces new mechanics, features, and subclasses for your D&D 5e character. Add new 1st-10th level options to your campaign and head out into adventure.
features: Revised rules, features, and mechanics for levels 1-10.
New class resources—channel your paladin's conviction and fulfill your oath.
Overwhelm your enemies with powerful smites and sacred auras.
New subclasses and subclass options—choose your specialty from the very first level.
Recover your strength with a long rest.
Variant dials to customise your playstyle.
